SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!---------------------Logging Connection Details------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Host name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Domain\Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain\Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Connection Timeout(second) : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Timeout (seconds)" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_CONN_TIMEOUT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Authentication Type : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_AUTH_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! WinRM Options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "WinRM Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.
